pullrequest.title: use ign-cmake1 prereleases for a few more months

content.raw:
+1

We should also keep in mind that version 0 has been released just a few months ago. If we release 1 now, there's a big chance Gazebo 10 will use ign-cmake2, since it's still 8 months away and we know everything changes. This means someone migrating from Gazebo9 to 10 will miss a tick-tock cycle. (Not sure if this all matters in the case of ign-cmake though)
